languages.text: "В таком случае традиции велят ему сохранить дар в знак уважения к акту инициации ритуала. В остальном же ваш друг должен игнорировать произошедшее. Порой бездействие... красноречивее любого отказа".

traits.locale_text: "В таком случае традиции велят ему сохранить дар в знак уважения к акту инициации ритуала. В остальном же ваш друг должен игнорировать произошедшее. Порой бездействие... красноречивее любого отказа".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."
languages.original_text: "В таком случае традиции велят ему сохранить дар в знак уважения к акту инициации ритуала. В остальном же ваш друг должен игнорировать произошедшее. Порой бездействие... красноречивее любого отказа".

traits.locale_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Entonces la tradición dicta que conserve el regalo en señal de respeto por la intención del obsequiador al iniciar el ritual. Aparte de eso, su amigo no debería responder en modo alguno. A veces el silencio... habla con mayor elocuencia que cualquier rechazo».
languages.original_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces la tradición dicta que conserve el regalo en señal de respeto por la intención del obsequiador al iniciar el ritual. Aparte de eso, su amigo no debería responder en modo alguno. A veces el silencio... habla con mayor elocuencia que cualquier rechazo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「その場合、伝統的に儀式を始めた贈り主の行為に対する敬意の印として、贈り物を保管することになっています。ご友人はそれ以外の反応をするべきではありません。時には何も言わないことのほうが…どんな拒絶よりも明確にメッセージを伝えることができます」
languages.original_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."

traits.locale_text: 「その場合、伝統的に儀式を始めた贈り主の行為に対する敬意の印として、贈り物を保管することになっています。ご友人はそれ以外の反応をするべきではありません。時には何も言わないことのほうが…どんな拒絶よりも明確にメッセージを伝えることができます」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那么依照传统，他应该收下那件礼物，以表示对发起仪式的送礼者的尊重。但除此之外，你的朋友不该做出任何回应。有时候，沉默……比任何形式的拒绝都更具有说服力。”
languages.original_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."

traits.locale_text: “那么依照传统，他应该收下那件礼物，以表示对发起仪式的送礼者的尊重。但除此之外，你的朋友不该做出任何回应。有时候，沉默……比任何形式的拒绝都更具有说服力。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, la tradition veut qu'{mf|il|elle} conserve le cadeau en signe de respect pour le geste de la personne qui a engagé le rituel. Cependant, votre {mf|ami|amie} doit s'abstenir de toute autre réponse. Le silence est parfois... bien plus éloquent qu'un refus. »
languages.original_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, la tradition veut qu'{mf|il|elle} conserve le cadeau en signe de respect pour le geste de la personne qui a engagé le rituel. Cependant, votre {mf|ami|amie} doit s'abstenir de toute autre réponse. Le silence est parfois... bien plus éloquent qu'un refus. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Dann schreibt die Tradition vor, dass er das Geschenk behält, als Respekt davor, dass der Schenkende das Ritual begonnen hat. Abgesehen davon sollte Euer Freund nicht antworten. Manchmal ist Schweigen ... eloquenter als jede Zurückweisung."
languages.original_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."

traits.locale_text: "Dann schreibt die Tradition vor, dass er das Geschenk behält, als Respekt davor, dass der Schenkende das Ritual begonnen hat. Abgesehen davon sollte Euer Freund nicht antworten. Manchmal ist Schweigen ... eloquenter als jede Zurückweisung."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."

languages.text: "O hâlde gelenek doğrultusunda, hediyeyi verenin girişimine duyduğu saygıyı göstermek adına hediyeyi iade etmemesi gerekir. Bunun dışında arkadaşın hiçbir şekilde karşılık vermemeli. Bazen suskunluk, her türlü redden daha etkilidir."
languages.original_text: "Then tradition dictates that he keep the gift as a sign of respect for the giver's act of initiating the ritual. Apart from that, your friend should make no response. Sometimes silence... speaks more eloquently than any rejection."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde geleneğe göre, hediyeyi verenin girişimine duyduğu saygıyı göstermek adına hediyeyi iade etmemesi gerekir. Bunun dışında arkadaşın hiçbir şekilde karşılık vermemeli. Bazen suskunluk, her türlü redden daha etkilidir."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
